bid(uint256).details: Use the unique ID to trace the NFT so the user can make a bid on the NFT.the new bid has to be greater than the previous bid too Tip: display the value of the last bid

claimMyFunds(uint256).details: onlyAuctioneer verifies that the auctioneer is the one trying to collect the funds for the NFT (uniqueID)pay the auctioneer the bidded amount and transfer the NFT to the winner of the bid

params._minimumStake: The minimum amount that can be accepted for a bid
params._nftAddress: This is the address of the nft we are auctioning.
params._tokenId: This is so we transfer the right token in the collection

bid(uint256).notice: Allows a user to make a bid on an NFT using a unique ID after making payment

claimMyFunds(uint256).notice: Allows the auctioneer to claim the highest bid in the auction

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the auctioneer can perform this action"
